title: Kalista Mini-Rework

embed.title: Kalista needs an update * r/leagueoflegends
embed.description: Let me say first, that I have played Kalista A LOT and I really like the champions design, I like the playstyle and I like how it feels to rend 50...

body:
The reddit post I linked really says it all, just to sum it up a little:
Kalista is really bad right now. In my opinion she should be updated, and my Idea would be to make her W passive deal a little less instant damage, but everytime she procs it on a champion, she gets some onhit magic damage against that champ, for the next 5 seconds. That damage could also be %-max HP, and also it can scale with AP. That lets Kalista use the AP from rageblade (which she builds anyways) and maybe even enables her to get sth. like a nashors tooth. Make her embrace the onhit style.
